title: Sweet and spicy chicken
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons honey', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh root ginger', '2 teaspoons chopped garlic', '2 tablespoons hot sauce', 'salt and pepper to taste', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into 1cm strips', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil']
